name: Drag Of War
description:
This is a casual competitive game that breaks through the traditional sense, because you can see the match between various professional players in the game, such as: aliens and cowboys, scarecrows and clowns, superman and Santa Claus and so on.

Maybe they have a dispute over the queue-jumping, so they decided fight it out on the competition terrain.

The rule of the game is just what pull your opponent over the white line, then you win. Brute force is not recommended, skill is decisive.

Now it's up to you to decide their destiny!

In addition, there are easter eggs waiting for you to discover.
